column1: Freight trains passing from Barking which usethe Up Tilbury (ML) and contain pathing timebetween Dagenham Dock and Barking

No pathing time to be included in the Up direction between Barking and Barking Station Junction when following atrain from Barking platform 1 as the signal overlap fouls the junction. Trains are regulated at Barking Station forconflicts at Barking Station Junction.
